titleStmt.title: A caveat to the unwary: or, Venus unveil'd. With all her venerial train, as also her several disguises and various shapes and forms laid open, after a pretended cure ...
titleStmt.author: Clark, T., fl. 1700.

notesStmt.note: Imprint and author information from Wing (CD-ROM, 1996).
With a woodcut illustration of supine figure covered with scabs; the words "In maximus meis Doloribus" are in compartment above figure.
Imperfect: loss of text in caption title.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
